title: GooglePlay trouble

Sorry! This content is not available in your country yet.

That's what i get when clicking on google play install link.

Perhaps, an apk should be in releases? Just for those who can't use google

title: Project migrated to gradle + wifi ssid check added
Create strings.xml
body: ru_RU locale

title: Duplicated notifications
body:
I am using linconnect between a Galaxy S5 and Mageia 5. I have no idea what version of linconnect I am running.

Whenever linconnect sees a new email on my phone, it displays alerts for that email plus the previous 8 or 10 emails. Sometimes it sends those 8 or 10 alerts 2 or 3 times in a row. This happens with every new email, not just the first time after I configure the app in the phone with the IP address of the desktop.

title: No scan autostart
body: This commit prevents client from starting to listen multicast when linconnect starts. Also, linconnect server discovery can be canceled just by tapping on "Scanning network for servers .." button

title: Notifications not works with wifi tethering
body:
Only test message works
on android 4.4.2

title: Not show whatsapp message
body: The content (text) of whatsapp message not appear in the notification, only the number of message.

title: Set custom sound for notifications on per app basis
body:
I know it's probably should be done in new application and few of them are on market already.
But still would be nice to have such feature.

title: This fixes an exception when a SpannableString was casted to a String.
body: Both Objects provide the same output when used with toString()

title: No source for 2.21
body: We at FDroid, a free/libre/opensource app "store", received the request to package 2.21 found in the playstore. The verCode in the Manifest is still at 2.20, did you forget to push the changes?

title: Recent version has problems with SMS text
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
After the recent update the text from incoming SMS is not displayed anymore.
The source (name+photo) and application (via SMS/MMS) is correctly displayed, but not the content.

title: Trouble installing
body: Sorry wrong one, meant to be in server

title: Need to store android notifications in a text file on android device itself
body: Is there any way to store the android notifications in text file on the device itself, ie on persistent storage?

title: Enable sending notifications over regular network (3g)
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Can you enable sending notification over regular networks?
In case I use public IP address for notification server I can't receive them untill device connects to wifi.

title: No notifications received from android after hello from android test successful
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
Using android 4.4 x86 in qemu.

![lca](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1709805/4093567/40bd6818-2f9e-11e4-9d8b-a19105b424eb.jpg)
- Using custom IP address
- Hello from android test works, but nothing else notifies

![not](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1709805/4093444/f917ad1c-2f9c-11e4-8d20-20ef081cfb55.jpg)
- Refresh server list does not find any servers

![lcu](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1709805/4093599/7d163560-2f9e-11e4-80ed-4ab912fda29d.jpg)
- Linconnect  notifications enabled
- All app notifications enabled

Tried
- skype
- hangouts
- clock

title: Blocks "Ok Google" when enabled in Accessibility
body:
On Nexus 5, after enabling LinConnect in `Settings > Accessibility > Services`, the phone stops responding to "Ok Google" words both in app screens and home screen. Disabling LinConnect there fixes the issue immediately.

On a contrary, LastPass, having similar privilege requirements ("Observe your actions") does not affect the "Ok Google" function.

Android version: 4.4.4
LinConnect version: 2.20

title: Notification from new apps
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: When a new application, you notice him automatically activated. Would be a choice to receive or not to receive alerts from the new applications.

title: support for dismissing notifications
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Hey there, 
how about adding support for dismissing the phone's notifications directly from the popup?
Greetings!

title: How about bluetooth support?
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: I really like this application, but don't use it over wifi. I meddled with it a bit to get it working(hackish) over bluetooth. How about adding that as an experimental feature? I could look into the server as well.

title: Crash when updating other apps
body: The client crashes almost always whenever other apps are installed/updated. Possibly not handling the nic being busy?

body: Always crashes at the time of incoming/outcoming call. I've just send stacktrace to Google Play (4.1.2 / SGS2)
